answers.answer: Please see a doctor ASAP.  You might have pre - eclampsia. ....
I'm seeing the midwife tomorrow so will ask her, thanks x x
I agree. Could be pre-eclampsia. Start by lowering your sodium intake immediately!

Do you work on your feet?  I do but I didn't notice any major swelling until a few weeks ago (I'm 37 weeks and have a bad case of elephantitis lol).  Everyone's different but definitely ask about preeclampsia and watch your blood pressure.
Thanks for your comments ladies! Have been to the midwife,  blood pressure and everything was ok, cut down sodium and had my feet up more- seen a definite improvement!  X x
Compression socks, they were my best friend while I worked

question: I'm 25 weeks pregnant and my legs look horrific! Sometimes they swell up so I elevate them and it seems to go down but they have gone so bumpy and elephant looking! Any tips off anyone please?  X x
title: Elephant legs!
